alertRules.name: CPUUtilization
alertRules.query: Perf | where ObjectName == 'Processor' and CounterName == '% Processor Time' and InstanceName == '_Total' | summarize AvgCPUUsage=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer | where AvgCPUUsage > 80

alertRules.name: MemoryUsage
alertRules.query: Perf | where ObjectName == 'Memory' and CounterName == '% Committed Bytes In Use' | summarize AvgMemoryUsage=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer | where AvgMemoryUsage > 80

alertRules.name: DiskIO
alertRules.description: Alerts on high disk transfers per second
alertRules.query: Perf | where ObjectName == 'LogicalDisk' and CounterName == 'Disk Transfers/sec' | summarize AvgDiskTransfers=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer | where AvgDiskTransfers > 100

alertRules.name: DiskSpace
alertRules.description: Alerts when disk space is running low
alertRules.query: Perf | where ObjectName == 'LogicalDisk' and CounterName == '% Free Space' | summarize AvgFreeSpace=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer | where AvgFreeSpace < 20

alertRules.name: DiskQueueLength
alertRules.description: Alerts on high disk queue length
alertRules.query: Perf | where ObjectName == 'PhysicalDisk' and CounterName == 'Avg. Disk Queue Length' | summarize AvgDiskQueueLength=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer | where AvgDiskQueueLength > 2

alertRules.name: NetworkIO
alertRules.query: Perf | where ObjectName == 'Network Interface' and CounterName == 'Bytes Total/sec' | summarize AvgNetworkTraffic=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer | where AvgNetworkTraffic > 100000000

alertRules.name: NetworkPackets
alertRules.query: Perf | where ObjectName == 'Network Interface' and CounterName == 'Packets/sec' | summarize AvgNetworkPackets=avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer | where AvgNetworkPackets > 1000

alertRules.name: CpuUsageAlert
alertRules.description: Alerts when SQL Server CPU usage exceeds 80%
alertRules.query: AzureMetrics | where ResourceId contains 'SQL' and MetricName == 'cpu_percent' | summarize AvgCpuUsage=avg(Total) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m) | where AvgCpuUsage > 80

alertRules.name: MemoryUsageAlert
alertRules.description: Alerts when SQL Server memory usage exceeds 80%
alertRules.query: AzureMetrics | where ResourceId contains 'SQL' and MetricName == 'memory_percent' | summarize AvgMemoryUsage=avg(Total) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m) | where AvgMemoryUsage > 80

alertRules.name: Deadlocks
alertRules.description: Alerts when SQL Server deadlocks occur
alertRules.query: AzureDiagnostics | where ResourceId contains 'SQL' and EventName == 'deadlock' | summarize Deadlocks=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m) | where Deadlocks > 0
